CSSList-style-image.summary: The list-style-image CSS property sets an image to be used as the list item marker.

remarks.para: It is often more convenient to use the shorthand list-style.

blockquote.para: Note: This property is applied to list items, i.e. elements with {{cssxref("display")}}: list-item; by default this includes li elements. Because this property is inherited, it can be set on the parent element (normally ol or ul) to let it apply to all list items.

remarks.para:
-list-style shorthand
-list-style-type property
-list-style-position property
-{{cssxref("::marker")}} pseudo-element
-CSS lists and counters module
-CSS counter styles module
